name: Barro 22
description:
Barro 22 is a racing game with a toy car / go kart style, the next gen for Barro Racing now with the tracks from the first game of the series.

The game

  • 25 Race tracks
  • 7 new vehicles
  • Time Trial
  • Single player (Casual race vs Bots)
  • Multiplayer (split screen, up to 4 players)
